data.text:
Age, Biography and Wiki

Neil Young is a Canadian singer-songwriter and musician. He is among the most influential and prolific songwriters and performers of the rock technology. Young began performing as a solo artist in Canada in 1960, ahead of transferring to California in 1966, the place he co-founded the band Buffalo Springfield with Stephen Stills and Richie Furay. He then joined Crosby, Stills & Nash in 1969. Young has launched over 35 studio albums, together with Harvest (1972), Rust Never Sleeps (1979), and Freedom (1989). He has additionally released a number of reside albums, compilations, and collaborations with different artists. He has gained several awards, including a Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award in 2005. Young is 68 years outdated. He is 5 ft 10 inches (178 cm) tall and weighs approximately a hundred and sixty lbs (73 kg). His zodiac sign is Capricorn. Young has been married two times. He was once first married to Susan Acevedo from 1968 to 1970. He then married Pegi Morton in 1978 and they have two youngsters in combination. Young has an estimated net value of $50 million. He has earned his wealth through his a hit song profession. He has sold over 50 million information international and has gained numerous awards. He additionally earns cash from his investments and endorsements.

Timeline

In January 2007 Young stepped down from the bench, returning to non-public practice. In 2016 and 2017 the Doyle's record of 'Leading Competition Law Barristers' included Neil as one of Australia's leading preeminent Senior Counsels.

Neil John Young is a Melbourne barrister, Queen's Counsel, and previous Judge of the Federal Court of Australia. He served on the Federal Court from 30 November 2005 to 24 January 2007.

Young spent a 12 months with a Wall Street law firm and a 12 months running for the Australian practice Allen Allen & Hemsley, prior to he began practising on the Victorian Bar in 1979. He practices commercial law, corporations law, industry practices, attraction instances and taxation. He was appointed Queen's Counsel in 1990. In 1997-1998 he used to be Chairman of the Victorian Bar, and President of the Australian Bar Association in 1999. In November 2005 he was once appointed Judge of the Federal Court of Australia, at which time his colleagues described him as "one of the most organised people imaginable. Painstakingly so. He is conscientious and utterly measured in his courtroom presentation, much to the chagrin of fellow barristers whose cases fell to Young's medium-paced delivery."

Young was admitted to the Victorian Bar on 3 March 1975. From 1975 to 1976 he used to be Judge's Associate to High Court Justice Sir Ninian Stephen.

Young was once trained at St Bede's College, Mentone. In 1973 Young finished his legislation level with top notch honours at Melbourne University. He used to be a tutor at Melbourne University and Ormond College. He completed a Masters at Harvard in 1977.
